Text:
I had Little Snitch 2.2.4 installed before this and was registered with the serial given on this site and had blocked UI agent and everything was going well.

 Then I installed 2.3.3 version and it upgraded taking the old key as a valid one.

 One day after I installed the latest version it said that the old key is invalid and I had to get a new one. It checked with its homesite. Well, I registered with your new key and it worked but still how can it have checked the key although UI Agent was still blocked? Just a point  of concern..........

dinodig try to give a short with this one:

Step1. Block obdev.at in /etc/hosts by adding the line: 127.0.0.1 obdev.at
Step2. Block Little Snitch with Little Snitch - within LilSnitch Configuration, click "New" then select Deny Connections at top, and choose the application /Library/Little Snitch/Little Snitch UIAgent
Step3. Enter a serial number

Good luck!
polisdavid, thanks for the serial! awesome sharing!

@polisdavid:

Do i have to de-install the old one fisrt and then install the new one , or i can also install the new one on the old one?

Thx a lot for the good job =O)
